jobDescription: Data Analyst/ Developer  6-11 month contract  Seattle, WA  We are seeking a Data Analyst/Developer with a passion for data for a 6-11 month contract assignment with our technology client in Seattle, WA. In this role, you will be responsible for extracting data from multiple sources and streamlining it into usable data in a data visualization environment.  The ideal candidate will have:  Ability to simplify data and feed it into Tableau dashboards  PowerShell or Bash scripting experience required  Experience with data languages such as R or python  Strong SQL experience and working with SQL databases  Some experience with web development- HTML, JavaScript, etc.  Experience with dashboard deployment into a cloud environment would be a huge plus  Experience in a data visualization environment  Experience turning raw data into visual data  Experis is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE/AA)
